page.title: 17COMMUNITY POLICEMEN
page.content: This term, Colin called every Tuesday to give us lessons about the police and their jobs. One week we all entered a competition drawing a picture on not to drop litter. Another week we had a debate on whether a person should be killed for killing someone else. He brought a Range Rover to our school and we could sit in it if we wanted to. Its registration number was RPP 284W; it had 20 lights and cost Â£12000. A week or two after we made a visit to Welwyn Garden City Police Station in the police van and were locked in the cells. {COLETTE COBAIN
